result.name: chesil-beach-and-stennis-ledges-marine-conservation-zone-mcz-survey-data
result.notes:
One survey of Chesil Beach and Stennis Ledges rMCZ site have been completed to 
date (July 2013):

Cruise: EA_stgn0213

Date: April 2013 - July 2013

Data collected:

MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): 100% (CHP)

MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): 100% (CHP)

SS Coverage: None acquired to date

Video and Stills Samples to date: 69 video transects; 651 stills analysed - 
Usable

PSA Samples to date: 32

Infauna Samples to date: 25

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
